X.iii.1.D.4.c
.
Reducing Section 306 Pension Upon a Veteran’s Return From an Authorized Absence
Upon receipt of notice that a Veteran has returned to the hospital, reduce either a Section 306 Pension award (if still in order) effective the date of return.
Reference
:  For information on adjustment of awards for incompetent Veterans, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.F.5
.
